title: QuickLink | URL Shortener
subtitle: Open Source URL Shortener
description: QuickLink is an open-source URL shortening application developed with the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React and Node.js). It allows you to generate short links and QR codes with JWT authentication and cookie management. Its interface is modern and responsive thanks to Tailwind CSS.

title: XUE
subtitle: Control of Clinical Providers
description: Initial project that arose when trying to solve the need that arose in my experience as an apprentice in SURASURA.

title: Reading List App
description: Based on the technical tests challenge MidudevMidudev.

title: Escape The QA Maze
description: Game to learn quality control concepts. Made for a university project.
